name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Features modern UI with loading animations, audio player, and drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: v1.2.8: Removed PluginPages prerequisite. Completely native dialog module bypasses routing blocks completely internally fixing user preference persistence flawlessly.
v1.2.7: Added native cleanup configuration for uninstallation so sidebar settings are correctly scrubbed upon removal.

v1.2.6: Updated YoutubeExplode. Fixed user preferences saving issue (deserialization case-sensitivity). Fixed general settings PermissionMode saving. Implemented proper jellyfin-plugin-pages integration for User Preferences access.
v1.2.5: Fixed permission check with parseInt, JSON casing, non-admin route for user prefs
v1.2.4: Fixed page conflicts - admin config and user preferences now separate pages
v1.2.3: User preferences accessible in sidebar - EnableInMainMenu + client-side sidebar injection
v1.2.2: Fixed user preferences userId parameter, client-side permission checks hide menu for non-admins
v1.2.1: Fixed user preferences menu visibility and permission checks - now properly restricts non-admin users
v1.2.0: Major update - Fixed scheduled task error, Export/Import themes, Role-Based Access Control, Per-User Preferences, reduced warnings from 5 to 1
v1.1.0: Enhanced UI - tabbed settings page, improved Media Library overview with inline audio players, bulk YouTube URL assignment, better table styling
v1.0.6: Fix config page tabs and improve Media Library UI
v1.0.5: Fix Media Library overview - use proper item type filtering
v1.0.4: Fixed critical build issue - plugin DLL was being deleted during build. Plugin now loads correctly in Jellyfin.
v1.0.3: Fixed plugin initialization - resolved null reference issue that prevented settings page and menu from appearing.
v1.0.2: Added delete theme song functionality, custom FFmpeg path configuration, media library overview tab with bulk URL assignment, handle theme.mp3 without theme.json.
v1.0.1: Fixed TV show path handling - theme songs now correctly save to show folder instead of parent directory. Also fixed Season to use parent Series folder.
v1.0.0: Major release with improved UI. Requires Jellyfin 10.11.0+ (uses .NET 9). Features: loading animations, modal success/error messages, audio player, YouTube download, MP3 upload.
